Package isv.sap.payment.addon.facade

Contains payment facade component, that provides business levels methods.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AlternativePaymentFacade
    A customization of existing PaymentFacade which defines methods related to Alternative payments.
    AlternativePaymentStatusFacade
    This interface defines methods related to alternative payments status checks.
    ApplePayPaymentFacade
    A customization of existing PaymentFacade which defines methods related to ApplePay payment.
    CreditCardPaymentFacade
    A customization of existing PaymentFacade which defines methods related to Credit Card payments.
    GooglePayPaymentFacade
    A customization of existing PaymentFacade which defines methods related to GooglePay payment.
    KlarnaPaymentFacade
    A customization of existing PaymentFacade which defines methods related to Klarna payment.
    PaymentInfoFacade  
    PaymentModeFacade
    This interface defines basic operations on payment modes.
    PayPalPaymentFacade
    A customization of existing PaymentFacade which defines methods related to PayPal payment.
    VisaCheckoutPaymentDetailsFacade
    This interface defines visa checkout payment details operations
    VisaCheckoutPaymentFacade
    A customization of existing PaymentFacade which defines methods related to VisaCheckout payment.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlternativePaymentStatusFacadeImpl
    Encapsulates an implementation of AlternativePaymentStatusFacade interface used at addon level.
    CheckoutFlowFacade
    A customization of SessionOverrideCheckoutFlowFacade component.
    PaymentModeFacadeImpl
    Encapsulates an implementation of PaymentModeFacade interface used at addon level.
    VisaCheckoutPaymentDetailsFacadeImpl
    Default implementation class of VisaCheckoutPaymentDetailsFacade

Package isv.sap.payment.addon.facade Description

Contains payment facade component, that provides business levels methods.
